I would say all year round for wear, evening and dates. Would recommend for my more confident friends</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1856858"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1856858#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1853700" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1853700" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SgtButtCheeks"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1580700"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1580700.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SgtButtCheeks" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Bleu-de-Chanel-Eau-de-Parfum-25967.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25967.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bleu de Chanel Eau de Parfum"title="Bleu de Chanel Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1853700ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1853700" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1580700">SgtButtCheeks</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-10">06/10/23 20:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is like if Brut by Faberge had a younger, way cooler brother who was best friends with James Bond and just broke up with Taylor Swift and now he’s writing songs about what a douche bag she is. <br />
I just got a travel sprayer of this and XERJOFF XJ 1861 Naxos from MicroPerfumes and it’s pretty freaky how similar they are. Both have the modern Brut vibe going on and I can’t believe I’m saying this, but that’s a good thing.<br />
I’ve never smelled beeswax in a fragrance. At least that I know of. If I said I could pick it out with as many notes as this has, I’d be lying.  Super masculine. Super clean.  It’s just a classic manly scent. <br />
Now I need to get a big bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1853700"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1853700#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1853282" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1853282" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fragaddict123"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1289934"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1289934.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fragaddict123" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1853282ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1853282" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1289934">Fragaddict123</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-10">06/10/23 07:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>While it garnered a lot of attention especially by older gentlemen in the community I was curious to try it <br />
The idea of a fougere with honey and beeswax is compelling enough for me <br />
Tried it on skin and on a blotter it was good not very promising but good <br />
The ultimate test was on my clothes and it was overwhelming not powerful but rough and rigid <br />
I felt it was trying so hard to impress I might say<br />
Performance was good it smelled good for a couple of hours then at almost 5th or 6th hour it became smoother <br />
I feel it’s one of these fragrances that need more chances to find their charm<br />
Right now I’m not very impressed by this</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1853282"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1853282#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1845631" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1845631" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="HermaeusMora13"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1658937"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1658937.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="HermaeusMora13" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1845631ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1845631" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1658937">HermaeusMora13</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-31">05/31/23 02:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Extremely creative blend. I don't think the honey is that prominent, the beeswax is more noticeable in my opinion. Smells like applying a very good quality aftershave and wearing a crisp freshly ironed shirt. Very elegant, gentlemanly and mature. The opening is sharp, metallic and ozonic with a lot of aldehydes but not in a bad way at all. A bit sweeter than the traditional aftershave/barbershop style, but still more fresh than sweet in my opinion.<br />
10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1845631"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1845631#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1825480" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1825480" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Athompson07"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723529"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Athompson07" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Acqua-di-Parma/Colonia-Intensa-1684.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1684.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Colonia Intensa"title="Colonia Intensa"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1825480ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1825480" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723529">Athompson07</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-05">05/05/23 07:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is really nice - the opening is almost like a little anise-y with the usual barbershop elements (lavender, etc.) and the dry down almost smells like a fancy root beer. It also reminds me of Davidoff Zino in the drydown - the difference is that Zino is like $20 for a 4 oz bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1825480"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1825480#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1820344" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1820344" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ryanok21"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1447959"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1447959.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ryanok21" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1820344ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1820344" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1447959">ryanok21</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-28">04/28/23 19:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a beautiful barbershop fragrance that also smells like a really good aftershave.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1820344"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1820344#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1812176" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1812176" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="azsmellz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1227031"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1227031.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="azsmellz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Homme-Original-69010.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69010.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Homme Original"title="Dior Homme Original"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1812176ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1812176" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1227031">azsmellz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-18">04/18/23 18:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This solidifies fougere as my favorite class of fragrances. Barber shoppy but not soapy, the lavender, beeswax/honey really make this a pleasure to wear. I heard that it is reminiscent of freshly ironed clothes, but I think this takes a bit of imagination. I do pick up slight metallic notes on the opening, but it's very faint. Also, I do notice the Brut note, but it is not the dominant scent. I really like to dress up for this, but it can also be worn with a t-shirt. Always a pleasant, clean smell and now one of my favorites. <br />
Scent 9/10<br />
Longevity 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1812176"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1812176#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1801137" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1384192">RawSmells</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-20">03/20/23 18:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Won't say much apart from that this fragrance is my no1 Penhaligon fragrance out of 15+ Penhaligon's in my collection, it's just so so so unique, addictive and versatile.  100% FB worthy, I'd say blind buy, but I can possibly sense it might be a marmite, loath or love.  I find it hard to understand how this can be a bland fragrance, yes it's not complex, nor is deep, but it's gorgeous :)<br />
<br />
Edit:  Ooooh I just noticed that in the "reminds me of" section, a few votes went to Brut, OMG, how did I forget about that fragrance? that's my childhood favourite, and oh yes it so does now ring bells of Brut!  No wonder why I love this fragrance, and even with that note in my head I love it more :D</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1788507"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1788507#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1784710" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1784710" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LauraAD"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1339124"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="LauraAD" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jeroboam/Ligno-54995.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54995.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ligno"title="Ligno"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1784710ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1784710" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1339124">LauraAD</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-16">03/16/23 03:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>On me this opens as lavender and pepper, it's clean and classic. I wear this as a mid-30s woman and I think it's definitely unisex, anyone with class and refinement can pull this off regardless of gender. As it dries down it becomes lavender with honey, amber and clean woody notes. I don't get much of the spice or ginger or metallic notes. Luxurious and refined, classy and classic, are the first words that spring to mind when I smell this. I love to wear it for business meetings as I feel it's definitely a "suit scent". Lasts over 10h and projects within arms length. Good all year round but I tend to reach for it more in spring.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1784710"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1784710#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1773711" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
Nice, but I get too much beeswax and it's a bit too floral for my taste too.<br />
<br />
7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1773711"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1773711#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1773647" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1773647" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="frankcrummit"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1660398"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="frankcrummit" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1773647ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1773647" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1660398">frankcrummit</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-03">03/03/23 00:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A non-event.<br />
<br />
Despite the hype ("hissing of the tailor's iron" etc) and a long list of notes , this comes across as a generic, perfectly pleasant but very bland fougere.<br />
<br />
I sprayed a goodly measure of this after using another fragrance as an after shave: the classic (and similarly constructed) Town &amp; Country from The Crown Perfumery Co. and the veteran won hands down. <br />
<br />
Sartorial is too subtle for its own good and, on me at least, it struggles to make any strong impression beyond : "Mmmmm ... it's OK"</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1773647"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1773647#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1773299" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1773299" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="miket67"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1606210"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1606210.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="miket67" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Spicebomb-Infrared-66514.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66514.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Spicebomb Infrared"title="Spicebomb Infrared"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1773299ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1773299" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1606210">miket67</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-02">03/02/23 13:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The King of mature, masculine barber-shop fragrances is Sartorial.<br />
Fight me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1773299"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1773299#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1759806" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1759806" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Maliken"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1598503"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1598503.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Maliken" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Royal-Oud-12317.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12317.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Royal Oud"title="Royal Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1759806ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1759806" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1598503">Maliken</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-14">02/14/23 07:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I’m in the process of discovering a lot of fragrances from Penhaligon’s (mostly from the Portraits collection) and have found them to be relatively disappointing in either scent, performance or both.  <br />
<br />
Sartorial is not one of those, to me this has incredible performance. It’s a barbershop style scent that smells modern and incredibly complex. Masculine and more on the mature side, I’m picturing someone in their 30’s and upwards. It’s also priced fair for a fragrance coming from a niche house with a complex scent profile and good performance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1759806"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1759806#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1757139" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1757139" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="In Fragrant Bliss"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1194581"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1194581.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="In Fragrant Bliss" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Noir-15727.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.15727.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Noir"title="Noir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1757139ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1757139" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1194581">In Fragrant Bliss</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-10">02/10/23 19:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My experience is based on using Rive Gauche &amp; 2 x 10mls splits of Ivasion Barbare back in 2015-16. Compared to Sartorial which I tried many a times in the same period, the former came across a bit screechy, while the later in current formulation was transparent corelated to price. My only qualm therefore from Sartorial was, low-moderate performance.<br />
<br />
Having enjoyed each wear of Sartorial, I was looking for a friend for my vintage 'Bois du Portugal' and scored an almost full bottle for AU$90. The performance from this bottle is noticeably better. So, either this is a pre-2014 formulation or possibly due to ageing the formulation has gotten stronger.<br />
 <br />
So no qualms anymore &amp; needless to say, I'm overjoyed !<br />
<br />
IG: @Eclectic.Scents</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1757139"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1757139#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1745377" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1745377" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Zaca"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1231844"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1231844.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Zaca" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mugler/A-Men-705.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.705.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="A*Men"title="A*Men"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1745377ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1745377" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1231844">Zaca</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-27">01/27/23 17:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Imagine a perfectly tailored, not a miss-stitch or crease to be found. Now imagine the suit’s olfactory equivalent: that’s Penhaligon’s Sartorial. <br />
<br />
I can actually smell the scent of a hot iron pressing against linen (with the accompanying hiss of steam) here. When I was a kid my mother ironed clothes for the local church: the house where she and others did it was just up from the church. It was a Seventh-Day Adventist church, so no incense there or in the house, just hard work and healthy living. I had completely forgotten about it until I smelled Sartorial. <br />
<br />
A touch of violet leaf (not violets), lavender, beeswax, animalic honey and leather. The beeswax and honey ties everything together. The aldehydes keep Sartorial light and airy. It does bear a resemblance to Brut, although lighter and more ephemeral. But it also reminds me more of another, now discontinued fragrance: Lanvin Avant Garde (although the cardamon in Avant Garde is more pronounced)  <br />
<br />
I love the ‘discipline’ of this fragrance: Duchafour has kept every note in its place, doing as much as is needed to contribute to the overall fragance: but no more. The best fougere I’ve tried and I’m in love with the aldehyde, hot iron, violet and beeswax/honey opening. Not a ‘hip’ tailor by any means. Traditonal, but it does not need to advertise: the quality speaks for itself.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1745377"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1745377#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1734819" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1734819" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bea777"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1515006"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1515006.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bea777" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Delina-43871.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43871.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Delina"title="Delina"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1734819ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1734819" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1515006">bea777</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-15">01/15/23 13:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My father wears this scent so of course it’s one which is comforting to me. This scent doesn’t feel too old fashioned and has a charming warmth to it.  It is complex and unique,  the cardamon note really comes through for me and I don’t dislike it at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1734819"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1734819#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1732688" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1732688" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PLK"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1456290"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1456290.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PLK" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Parfum-60035.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60035.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="1 Million Parfum"title="1 Million Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1732688ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1732688" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1456290">PLK</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-12">01/12/23 20:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As good as a barbershop fragrance gets, sweet, fresh, kind of a honeyed lavender smell.<br />
Subjective grade : 8,5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1732688"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1732688#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1725350" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1725350" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="stmad12"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1543741"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="stmad12" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1725350ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1725350" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1543741">stmad12</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-04">01/04/23 19:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I can't quite pinpoint why I love this one as much as I do, but it's one of my better blind buys. I'm not generally a fan of the fougère style but this one is done very artfully and in an understated sort of way which differentiates it from other fougères that I've tried. It lasts forever on my skin - I'll still have people remarking that they smell it after a 10-12 hour work day. <br />
<br />
My first and certainly not my last Penhaligons.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1725350"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1725350#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1722684" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1722684" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jayhawkforever"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1024368"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1024368.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jayhawkforever" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Floris/Elite-5545.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5545.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Elite"title="Elite"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1722684ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1722684" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1024368">Jayhawkforever</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-01">01/01/23 16:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I must disagree with ShaunMichael, in his review below he ranks this behind Beau de Jour &amp; Rive Gauche. This is so much better than Beau de Jour in my opinion. The complexity of this one far surpasses that of BdJ &amp; it's also my opinion this is simply a better scent. That being said I can only compare to the La Collection version of Rive Gauche &amp; that's closer with Sartorial edging it out. <br />
<br />
I'd also like to state that none of the aforementioned are equal to Garrigue by Maitre Parfumer et Gantier.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1722684"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1722684#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1713175" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1713175" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="autumnrequiem"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1250157"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="autumnrequiem" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Orage-49752.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49752.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Orage"title="Orage"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1713175ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1713175" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1250157">autumnrequiem</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-19">12/19/22 21:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Excellent fougère with a definitive classic twist, but somehow doesn’t smell like the fougères of yesteryear. Instead, this combines a lot of elements and complexity to create an unforgettable accord. One of the best barbershop-style fragrances ever.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1713175"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1713175#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1708467" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1708467" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Glyph"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1312716"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1312716.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Glyph" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/Xeryus-861.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.861.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Xeryus"title="Xeryus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1708467ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1708467" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1312716">Glyph</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-13">12/13/22 10:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sometimes you smell a great fragrance for the first time and think, "This is basically why the art of perfumery exists!" That's how I felt about first smelling Sartorial--it is an absolutely wonderful classic fougére with depth, complexity, and elegance, although the metallic notes lift it from being too old-fashioned or ordinary. There's a tiny bit of honey in it (but not too much to make it sickly sweet) that blends beautifully with the beeswax note, and even a tiny bit of leather (but not too much to make it dank) to give it more balance. <br />
<br />
This would make an ideal office scent, although it's also sophisticated enough to wear for evenings. This is one of the best scents from one of the first houses I ever tried--I can only wonder why it took me so long to try this fragrance from them.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1708467"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1708467#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1704201" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1704201" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pilotdc"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1587795"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1587795.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="pilotdc" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1704201ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1704201" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1587795">pilotdc</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-07">12/07/22 12:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First time I sampled Sartorial in Florida I was impressed and intrigued. My favorite part is in the drydown, about hour 6, the oakmoss really shone through and made me smell like a rainforest... for an ENTIRE DAY, even after a shower and a good night's sleep I could still smell the oakmoss on my arm. Really like the rainforest accord with the damp earth and green notes. <br />
Sampling for the 2nd time in Virginia, that accord is much less prominent and I think projects less. So I think this fragrance will smell differently in different settings/climates? Like maybe the humidity really contributed? Maybe I'm starting to go noseblind to some notes? <br />
<br />
Anyway, this is a great barbershop fragrance that I may get a full bottle of in the future. I think it's a work of art that I'd be interested in exploring how it performs on me in different climates and seasons. But then again, I don't work in an office so maybe fewer occasions to wear it.<br />
<br />
EDIT: sampling this in warmer temperatures brings out the best in it. Sartorial was made for Spring and early Autumn days and the shoulders (not the peak) of Summer, imo . Very complex with a touch of mystery. Should be rated among the best fougeres out there.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1704201"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1704201#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1704071" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1697220" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="astralmonad870"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1555935.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="astralmonad870" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dries-Van-Noten/Jardin-de-L-Orangerie-72594.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72594.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jardin de L'Orangerie"title="Jardin de L'Orangerie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1697220ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1697220" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935">astralmonad870</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-27">11/27/22 12:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My boyfriend splurged on a 100 ml bottle of this. This is really delightful. The beeswax in the middle notes really comes together with the foresty base notes of the cedar and oakmoss but there is also a soapy vetiver quality. Having metallic top notes is strange but Penhaligon's really knows how to combine a wide melange of diverse notes together. I would wear this too as a unisex perfume.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1697220"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1697220#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1695346" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1689805" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ROUSAK"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/34561"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ROUSAK" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1689805ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1689805" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/34561">ROUSAK</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-16">11/16/22 12:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Classy shaving cream vibe. One of the best barbershop colognes. 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1689805"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1689805#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1683973" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1683973" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="stacia79"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/151903"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.151903.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="stacia79" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1683973ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1683973" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/151903">stacia79</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-08">11/08/22 13:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Great example of me buying a fragrance sample without realizing that it's "for men" and then coming to understand it does not matter. This isn't overly masculine, it's more just fresh and unisex, slightly soapy herbal. The lavender and metallic accords are a brilliant match here. I once had a job that required a lot of ironing and steaming garments in a big room meant just for that activity. This reminds me of how that pressing room smelled. Sartorial made me want to wear a crisp white collared shirt and tweed skirt with the most minimalist jewelry. I smelled like someone who really has their s*** together! Thanks Penhaligon's for helping me fool everyone.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1683973"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1683973#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1681906" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1681906" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="joshuabrian"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/626694"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.626694.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="joshuabrian" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Opium-Pour-Homme-562.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.562.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Opium Pour Homme"title="Opium Pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1681906ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1681906" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/626694">joshuabrian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-05">11/05/22 18:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This stuff is seriously amazing. The king of fougeres as far as I’m concerned. Better than Rive Gauche and the MDCI and I love them both. Smells like amazing shaving cream. Ultra smooth. I don’t get the metallic notes. So happy I have this! Also, I don’t think this smells like Brut at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1681906"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1681906#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1674801" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1674801" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Iron_Yuppie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1596698"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Iron_Yuppie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1674801ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1674801" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1596698">Iron_Yuppie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-26">10/26/22 14:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Blind bought this at a duty free in Moscow six years ago. I’m now on my fourth bottle. It’s the standard Christmas gift my wife gets me each year because it is my everyday work scent. It’s got all the elements of a good fougère but there’s something else lingering underneath that I can never quite define. It’s the scent that doesn’t actually take me back to the days when my father would bring me to his Saturday trips to the barber, but it’s close enough that I get a wave of mostly good memories coupled with the feeling that I’m now there, but 30 years later. Hard to describe. My prior favorite was YSL Rive Gauche, but this supplanted it almost immediately. I don’t think I’ll ever stop wearing this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1674801"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1674801#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1670506" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
