A silvery smooth honey and lavender. Sophisticated, but fun. Recommend.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1670506"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1670506#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1660500" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1660500" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="WGG"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360297"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1360297.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="WGG" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1660500ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1660500" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360297">WGG</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-06">10/06/22 14:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is right up there with the best fougeres. Sartorial isnt dandy or jaunty or spicy.  What's unusual is the warm, comforting feel emerging in the drydown.  Elemi isn't listed but that's what it reminds of (think Dior's Eau Sauvage Parfum - I've the 2017 version).  I've only a sample but am enjoying this very much and may get an FB in time.  Highly versatile - multiple occasions/situations to wear.  Performance decent on me.<br />
4/5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1660500"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1660500#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1659456" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1659456" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="teh"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1371398"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1371398.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="teh" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Pur-Oud-66436.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66436.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pur Oud"title="Pur Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1659456ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1659456" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1371398">teh</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-05">10/05/22 08:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the very best offerings from the brand, both in terms of the scent composition and the storytelling. Classic fougere that is so elegantly done in a very timeless manner. It’s so complex but not overwhelming, crisp but not too harsh or aggressive. I love how sartorial delivers a fine portion of everything: wood, spices, warmth, sweetness, powder, musk, amber, freshness. Also, it lasts a really long time on skin for a Cologne/EDT. Can’t think of a better fougere than this - very blessed that I own a bottle!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1659456"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1659456#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1658781" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1658781" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="alphairone"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1213298"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1213298.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="alphairone" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Claudio-La-Viola/La-Lettera-Da-43914.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43914.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Lettera Da..."title="La Lettera Da..."></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1658781ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1658781" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1213298">alphairone</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-04">10/04/22 09:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Metal usually has a smell only when our skin touches it. It's a reaction, it's what our oils, perspiration, essence, does to its surface. The breakdown of these elements is what creates that smell. One component that is produced is octenone, which humans can detect at concentrations as low as 5 parts per trillion. It's about contact. We also see this contact in play with the use of a hot iron when it hits a shirt: water, heated conductors, perhaps some butyric acid from traces of residual sweat. Contact.<br />
<br />
Bertrand Duchaufour endeavored to capture this essence of contact on metal through the this "hot steam iron" accord and I do get is that sensation and some spray starch from wearing a crisp Oxford shirt. That satisfaction that I would feel once upon a time when I had to dress up for work, commute, and appear in an office, which is now long in the rearview as I now permanently work from home. Earthy, sweet beeswax and dusty lavender enhance this effect and as it all unfolds a linden blossom stirs up emotions: goodbye summer. <br />
<br />
There are echoes of my old man splashing on Brut, but let me be clear this is far from a facsimile of that, because there is the whole atmosphere, the honeyed glow that is the promise of a fresh day, a sparkle in willing eyes, some loose change in the pocket, some music playing to energize: Michael Penn's "No Myth" plays. Tying up some fine leather wing tips, throw on a cap, and I am out the door in to the wild human expanse. Looking for contact.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1658781"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1658781#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1639159" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1639159" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="The Wolf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263755"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1263755.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="The Wolf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Blanc-Kogane-88629.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88629.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Blanc Kogane"title="Blanc Kogane"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1639159ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1639159" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263755">The Wolf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-05">09/05/22 23:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've smelled hundreds and possibly thousands of fragrances, and this opening still blows me away. One of the best openings on earth. Oh, and the rest of the fragrance is good too. This will appeal to an an gentleman 35+ year old. A masterpiece; and the best from the house. <br />
<br />
Scent 10/10<br />
Performance 6.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1639159"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1639159#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1634319" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1634319" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="atxwatch"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1163228"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1163228.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="atxwatch" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Douro-5672.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5672.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Douro"title="Douro"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1634319ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1634319" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1163228">atxwatch</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-30">08/30/22 08:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To me, the opening of this is similar to something I wore as a young man, although I can't remember what it actually was.  The base notes are very much uncompromising green oakmoss and tonka, and I would even say borderline brutalist. This is definitely a nice fragrance, but in this genre, I think there are so many better ones like Trumper Curzon or even Penhaligon's Douro. And both of those show the oakmoss in the base much more elegantly, IMO. Perfectly nice fragrance, but ultimately not for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1634319"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1634319#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1632747" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1632747" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nkapped"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1559046"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="nkapped" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1632747ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1632747" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1559046">nkapped</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-27">08/27/22 18:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>An elegant, aromatic fougere that pays homage to the storied tradition of bespoke tailoring. There is plenty of lavender and honey and it beautifully evokes the workroom of a tailor: from the rich wood panels to the hiss of a steam iron to a pair of well-oiled shears cutting up a length of suiting fabric. Wearing this cannot fail to make one feel incredibly dapper.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1632747"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1632747#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1631227" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1631227" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Victor Lahovary"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1143312"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1143312.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Victor Lahovary" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Impudent-Cousin-Matthew-53875.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53875.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Impudent Cousin Matthew"title="The Impudent Cousin Matthew"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1631227ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1631227" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1143312">Victor Lahovary</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-25">08/25/22 12:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is one I unreservedly recommend, unlike other perfumes from this brand. Very good quality scent, and at a reasonable price, unlike many of its companions! Good sillage, good longevity, and very good value for money!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1631227"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1631227#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1631063" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1631063" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dpark"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1516832"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1516832.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dpark" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1631063ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1631063" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1516832">dpark</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-25">08/25/22 08:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Experience: Ironing a heavily starched shirt<br />
<br />
This is much lighter than the typical "barbershop" that I've tried.  This comes off very bright and zesty, with very mild spice in the background.  This easy wearing and not dated at all to my nose.<br />
<br />
The really interesting bit about this is that it has a convincing replica of the smell of a hot iron on a shirt with spray starch.  This smells clean and fresh and the first couple of times I wore this, I loved it.  However, the starched shirt trick gets tiring to my nose and subsequent wears move this from love into just like.  This is definitely not a daily driver for me.  The starchy accord is too much to wear regularly and loses its novelty.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1631063"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1631063#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1609838" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1609838" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KingerFD"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1540883"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1540883.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="KingerFD" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1609838ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1609838" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1540883">KingerFD</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-24">07/24/22 16:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Synthetic lavender with anise, cardamom, and a hint of ginger. This does not work for me at all. This is for the pimp of the nursing home. It’s old school. It’s brut with more naturals. I do appreciate the quality with this. It’s smells well made and not cheap, but ultimately this is an old school smell and it really shows it’s age. If that’s your thing. Go for it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1609838"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1609838#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1594319" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1594319" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mosmic"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1433497"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1433497.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mosmic" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Derby-17119.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17119.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Derby"title="Derby"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1594319ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1594319" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1433497">Mosmic</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-30">06/30/22 12:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the first review I write and it's gonna be an ode to this fragrance. I will start by saying that this fragrance is unapologetically old fashioned. But with a modern twist in it. It is fresh but also a bit sweet, sharp but a bit powdery, slightly animalic, elegant and mature. This is one of the most complex perfumes I have ever smelled. This complexity makes this very special to me, in a way that I only allow myself to wear it on special occasions. Another plus is its performance. I own quite a few fougeres and this is probably my favourite one together with Beau de Jour by Tom Ford. These two fragrances are like yin and yang to me. They serve the some purpose but this one is tradition that has modernity in it whereas BDJ is modern with tradition in it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1594319"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1594319#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1575090" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1575090" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="saccitygrl01"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1465373"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1465373.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="saccitygrl01" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Narciso-Rodriguez/Narciso-Poudree-36679.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.36679.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Narciso Poudree"title="Narciso Poudree"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1575090ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1575090" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1465373">saccitygrl01</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-31">05/31/22 19:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Reminds of crisp, clean percale white sheets and starched shirts.   It is a sweeter version of the fougere I recall my dad wearing when I was small--no idea what his aftershave was back then but maybe Clubman.  Anyway, I love Sartorial as its vintage with a modern twist.  It definitely leans to the masculine but I enjoy it so much I wear it anyway.   <br />
<br />
After the biting yet pleasant opening it softens and sweetens. The dominant notes on me are lavender, linden blossom, cardamon and a sweet woody base--maybe the balsam.  Not strong in the projection and sillage department which is fine by me.   A bit too expensive for what it is but I picked up my 1 oz from a discounter at a steal so no complaints here.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1575090"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1575090#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1554843" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1554843" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JmThms"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293565"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1293565.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JmThms" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Escada/Escada-pour-Homme-1364.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1364.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Escada pour Homme"title="Escada pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1554843ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1554843" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293565">JmThms</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-01">05/01/22 15:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a great barbershop Fougere, by accident. It was intended to be essentially a Replica scent of a specific London tailor shop, but in fulfilling that vibe quite admirably, it also defines itself as not only a "barbershop" Fougere, but an iconic one. A complex one - with aldehydes,  metallic notes, honey, beeswax - but one that fits squarely in that genre. It's got the exotic notes that throw a curve to the standard genre note lineup, even more so than MDCI Invasion Barbare,  with its violet and ginger notes. There is a pronounced earthy accord, and "Earthy" should be listed as an accord. The metallic notes are very nuanced, to the extend I detect almost no hint of them. Certainly nothing like the obtrusive metallic accords of Chanel Platinum Egoiste, Maison Martin Margiela Replica At the Barbers, or others. Sartorial has been demoted to #3 in my rather extensive barbershop Fougere collection, replaced by Invasion Barbare. I go back and forth between Sartorial and Invasion Barbare for the #2 spot. Tom Ford Beau de Jour is my #1. In the final analysis this is a well-crafted, artsy, complex fragrance that makes a better "At the Barbers" replica (and certainly tailor shop replica) than Maison Martin Margiela could manage. Performance as I define it is pretty good. This can be suited to a 25 year old man if he's oriented to the sophisticated, mature, elegant and conservative. Those typically going through their bubblegum-chompin' teens and 20's phase will dismiss Sartorial, hence the 4.21 (although good, its underrated) Fragrantica rating.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1554843"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1554843#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1554013" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1554013" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Russell August"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1372356"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1372356.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Russell August" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1554013ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1554013" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1372356">Russell August</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-30">04/30/22 08:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I would suggest that there are two types of people who buy and wear fougeres. One is someone looking for best, the most interesting or the single one that suits their personality. They are content with just one good example in their collection to represents the genre. The other is someone that, upon discovering fougeres, must discover more fougeres, own many, wear them and have favorites for different occasions. While I am new to my obsession, I am the latter. I love fougeres, and I am very happy to own a handful and keep buying more.<br />
<br />
Sartorial is not my favorite. I like the intensity of the lavender and licorice accord in Tom Ford’s Beau de Jour.  That said, owning Sartorial is in no way redundant to owning BDJ. They are both in the same camp, but Sartorial has that very unique accord associated with a high end taylor shop. That description truly fits.<br />
<br />
That accord — that feeling of a steamed and starched white shirt — is the best way to think about this fragrance. You will get lost immediately if you try to piece together the notes in the Fragrantica  profile above to understand this scent. Lavandar and oak moss.. sure, they are part of the magic of all fougeres. But don’t waste too much time trying to imagine how beeswax, honey, leather or lime blossom might smell when they come together. These notes give no clue to the overall feeling that awaits you with this scent. <br />
<br />
I knew when I first smelled Sartorial that there was something familiar here… something that made the taylor shop reference work for me. I had a suspicion, but not until I went to the grocery store to follow up on my suspicions and sprayed multiple brands of laundry starch did it click. One of the brands had this very scent profile that is part of the make-up of Sartorial. Sometimes dry cleaners smell like this… starch or sizing (which I think is another type of starch).  This was it; that was what I smelled. I am sure I have never smelled the beeswax on a taylor’s needle, but I have smelled starch being sprayed and then later on a pressed shirt. This is a fougere colored by that scent memory.<br />
<br />
If that sounds strange or too clever, I would suggest you not draw any impulsive conclusions. It really works in Sartorial. You feel clean. It compliments a well-dressed, professional man. I think it smells fantastic. <br />
<br />
In writing this I am sure I will draw some disagreement and criticism, and that is fine. I feel a bit as if I have just told an audience full of people how a magician performed his trick, but this is my honest opinion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1554013"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1554013#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1543891" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1543891" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mlke"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1417787"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1417787.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mlke" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1543891ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1543891" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1417787">mlke</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-15">04/15/22 04:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It’s a bit powdery, and metallic in a way that talcum or body powder (mix of minerals) can be? Or maybe an aluminum-based deodorant stick? I think that’s closest actually- a lavender deodorant stick. For all the notes they chose to list there’s not a lot that stands out. I get a hint of something sweet like honey in the dry down that rounds it out. Otherwise it’s a nondescript mix of powdered aromatics and lavender. On skin it disappeared pretty quickly. On paper it lasted but kept that weird deodorant/talcum powder smell. Honestly based on other reviews I wonder if I have the right sample, but then I’ll randomly find someone saying close to the same thing...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1543891"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1543891#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1531152" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1531152" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Raixon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1414037"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Raixon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Salvatore-Ferragamo/Acqua-Essenziale-Blu-24788.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.24788.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua Essenziale Blu"title="Acqua Essenziale Blu"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1531152ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1531152" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1414037">Raixon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-26">03/26/22 18:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like the scent but it smells just like a bar of Neutrogena soap after an hour.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1531152"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1531152#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1514398" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1514398" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Docplaya"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1466731"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1466731.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Docplaya" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1514398ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1514398" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1466731">Docplaya</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-01">03/01/22 13:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Big fan of the fougere/barbershop fragrances. I was excited to try this out since it had positive reviews. Sartorial has a very pleasant scent with notes of lavender, honey, and metal. This is more masculine and has more character than Invasion Barbare MDCI Parfums. This is more of a daytime fragrance and should be worn with smart attire. My job does not allow for dressy attire. Therefore, I don’t feel as though I would get much use out of this fragrance. In addition, my wife states it makes me smell elderly. Thus, this is not for me. I would still recommend Sartorial over Invasion Barbare since owing both would be redundant. <br />
<br />
Scent: 7<br />
Longevity: 8<br />
Silage: 7.5<br />
Versatility: 5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1514398"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1514398#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1512433" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I like the mix of metallic, sweet lavender, ozonic smell. Really classy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1512433"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1512433#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1510972" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1510972" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cinema Paradiso"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1459827"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cinema Paradiso" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Terre-d-Hermes-Eau-Givree-72439.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72439.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Terre d'Hermes Eau Givree"title="Terre d'Hermes Eau Givree"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1510972ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1510972" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1459827">Cinema Paradiso</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-24">02/24/22 04:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If i never smelled green Irish tweed and someone said "this is it, it's git" i would totally believe it. It's classic, floral, complex. It's manly in urban way. An opposite of a lumberjack smell. <br />
Tsar is on the opposite side of this lineage of a fragrance. Both are manly but Sartorial prefers to work smart while Tsar is all about brut force. <br />
35+ frag, not a daily wear tho. Redundant if you aren't a frag head. There are more obvious choices however, if you love fragrances, it should be in the menu.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1510972"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1510972#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1504466" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Definitely on the mature side. If Fougere D'argent is the American Executive, Sartorial is the British dandy/gangster. Although Sartorial is a bit sharper and has stronger projection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1504466"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1504466#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1495870" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; But better. I love me a beautiful Fougere. 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1495870"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1495870#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1493150" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1493150" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Llcj"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1211510"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Llcj" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Sutton-Place-41010.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41010.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sutton Place"title="Sutton Place"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1493150ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1493150" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1211510">Llcj</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-28">01/28/22 18:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wow.  I was expecting a typical mens fougere a lot of lavender, oakmoss which I can appreciate.  This takes those elements and adds some sweet and soft elements from the honey and amber and just makes this magical.  I can’t believe how surprised I am and was hesitant because I have at the barbers (which I absolutely love) and thought it’d be redundant.  It is completely different.  It’s still gentlemanly but soft and ambery.  Beautiful</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1493150"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1493150#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1481808" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1481808" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sf2explus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/40256"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.40256.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sf2explus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maurer-Wirtz/Tabac-Original-28000.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.28000.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tabac Original"title="Tabac Original"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1481808ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1481808" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/40256">sf2explus</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-12">01/12/22 15:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the best barbershop scents out their. It is very refined, fresh and warm at the same time, the honey adds a caramel like effect in the background whilst its super clean fresh on the top that stay and stays. After 6 hours the warmth from the honey is more obvious, there is a subtle waxy note that also lingers with a steam note, if anyone has been in a tailor room. the steam iron that press down fabric release this nice scent and you have alot of that in sartorial.<br />
Lasting power is very good u will get 8-12 hours with 4 full sprays. the projection is also very nice you will have a small bubble around you for most of the day.<br />
I usually use this on a special occasion and prefer it in the cooler months. I have always lived in London and this fragrance makes me think of London in every single way.<br />
This is not for boys, i would say anyone above 25 can wear this but people above 30 will appreciate it's quality and style.<br />
This one is staying in my collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1481808"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1481808#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1478125" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1478125" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nchux"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/906435"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="nchux" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gio-Profondo-Lights-66265.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66265.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua di Giò Profondo Lights"title="Acqua di Giò Profondo Lights"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1478125ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1478125" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/906435">nchux</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-07">01/07/22 05:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A must have in your collection , EVEN if you are not into classic aromatics.<br />
<br />
Classic barber shop scent , it reminds me how a father smells .Sartorial is an aromatic herbal woody spicy in opening with some hints of metallic notes, with one of THE BEST LAVANDER note ever. The dry down is sweeter and very subtle pleasant aromatic scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1478125"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1478125#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1475064" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
