align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1374106"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1374106#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1373107" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1373107" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bugs1e"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360332"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1360332.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bugs1e" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Roja-Dove/Enigma-Pour-Homme-Parfum-Cologne-57876.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57876.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Enigma Pour Homme Parfum Cologne"title="Enigma Pour Homme Parfum Cologne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1373107ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1373107" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360332">Bugs1e</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-09">07/09/21 06:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This scent is a dapper city gent that enjoys a social. Both myself and my 23 year old son enjoy this one. The lavender is there all the way through and the pepper definitely gives a little wake up during the early drydown. I love the sillage. My son left for work and I could still smell this one nearly an hour later!!! Love it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1373107"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1373107#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1372083" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1372083" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Traceur Nath"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1347290"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1347290.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Traceur Nath" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1372083ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1372083" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1347290">Traceur Nath</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-07">07/07/21 10:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It is a lovely and complex scent, although at times it feels a little bit muddled. I get a bit of a damp towel vibe from the notes at times also. Regardless, it's a modern classic, and one I really like.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1372083"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1372083#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1372051" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1372051" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jimmystinks"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1101420"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1101420.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jimmystinks" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Pegasus-16938.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16938.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pegasus"title="Pegasus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1372051ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1372051" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1101420">Jimmystinks</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-07">07/07/21 09:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Reminds me of a Nicolas Cage film … Gone in 60 Seconds</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1372051"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1372051#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1369564" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1369564" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pəˈCHo͞olē"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1174690"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1174690.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="pəˈCHo͞olē" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Roja-Dove/Elysium-Pour-Homme-Parfum-47480.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.47480.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Elysium Pour Homme Parfum "title="Elysium Pour Homme Parfum "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1369564ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1369564" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1174690">pəˈCHo͞olē</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-02">07/02/21 11:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Brut is cheap, synthetic, harsh and altogether revolting. To compare it to this is quite muddleheaded. On a crisp autumn day, this is close to perfection. The only caveat is if you are under 25 and enjoy smelling of sweet bubblegum.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1369564"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1369564#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1368339" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1368339" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mando"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/47298"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.47298.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mando" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/J-adore-210.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.210.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="J'adore"title="J'adore"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1368339ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1368339" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/47298">Mando</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-30">06/30/21 09:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Was this scent discontinued? I noticed on their website it's "Out of Stock" now. The prices of it on eBay are insane too. Figures I'd like a scent that will be unattainable.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1368339"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1368339#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1354153" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1354153" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ikea pencil"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1327427"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1327427.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ikea pencil" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1354153ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1354153" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1327427">ikea pencil</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-03">06/03/21 21:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Freshly ironed button shirt that was recently washed with heavy lavender laundry detergent.<br />
<br />
The lavender here is definitely soapy than herb-y, borderline laundry detergent. On my first wear It reminded me of walking along my neighborhood past houses that have their washing machine going. The second time it hit me as air fresher they spray all over a mid-tier hotel bathroom. The "fresh spicy" accord should be higher up on the scale, and that comes from the metallics and aldehydes. This fragrance undeservedly got labeled as masculine because of the fresh spicy accord here but I'd love to smell this on a woman as well! This is definitely unisex. I can't quite pin-point where people see beeswax/honey here. There's a vague warm cloth scent that's from the moss (and maybe the beeswax?). There's also some vague sweetness here but it's not quite honey-like. It's vaguely reminiscent of mint tic-tacs (...?). There's a woody base here as well but it's very foggy and synthetic.<br />
<br />
This all comes together for something very nice and casual. Not fbw for me but I can see a co-worker or a friend wearing this when they wanna smell nice without making a statement. I do appreciate that for an "office-friendly" perfume, this fragrance is just sharp enough to moderately grab your nose, but not push it. Good balance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1354153"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1354153#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1353456" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1353456" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tessture"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2719"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2719.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tessture" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/I-Profumi-di-Firenze/Acqua-Mirabile-Odorosa-di-Firenze-9765.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9765.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua Mirabile Odorosa di Firenze "title="Acqua Mirabile Odorosa di Firenze "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1353456ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1353456" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2719">tessture</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-02">06/02/21 19:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A true love.  It really does smell like fresh ironed shirts, of steam and linen, almost in a Demeter realistic way.  Then it smells of barbershop. Steam-pressed high end linen shirts; metallic, starchy, slightly chemical soap drying down to a  great smooth barbershop scent, with green wood, soap, that faint metallic note still.  It’s somehow outdoorsy and soapy at the same time. It is very very masculine, but I don't care. I'm going to wear this myself. If my husband will wear it for me, great,  but I will be getting more of this for me. It's wonderful.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1353456"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1353456#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1351968" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1351968" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="IrynaP"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1318837"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="IrynaP" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1351968ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1351968" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1318837">IrynaP</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-31">05/31/21 00:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very nice, clean, soapy, not loud, mostly lavender after 10 min, close to the skin, the smel of skin with soap,</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1351968"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1351968#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1348287" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1348287" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="J350"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1201660"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="J350" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1348287ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1348287" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1201660">J350</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-23">05/23/21 18:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I won’t go to in-depth with the notes. <br />
<br />
The top notes and the first spray can be a little overpowering and maybe even offensive but it’s the heart and base notes is where you really get to appreciate the true beauty of this! <br />
<br />
This is very much a masculine scent perfect all year round. Not a statement fragrance but this is something that is empowering, confident and classy! This is perfect for date nights and office meetings and office wear.<br />
<br />
Overall rating: 8.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1348287"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1348287#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1328103" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1328103" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BoozyBrunch88"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1251207"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="BoozyBrunch88" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1328103ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1328103" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1251207">BoozyBrunch88</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-19">04/19/21 04:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Brut on steroids! <br />
11/10 <br />
London gentlemen <br />
do not be put off by the note breakdown with being too much, its what makes this what it is.. a master piece</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1328103"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1328103#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1302534" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1302534" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ikea50"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1266639"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ikea50" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1302534ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1302534" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1266639">ikea50</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-03-04">03/04/21 20:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I must say this really disappointed me. The top note is excellent. You get a burst of lavender and cardamom a la traditional barbershop fragrances. It quickly settles into a smooth leather and creamy beeswax (that is not sweet at all). It becomes a skin scent after 1-2 hours with almost no sillage. Objectively, the pros are it is unique, versatile, undoubtedly masculine, and perfect for the mature gentleman looking for a reserved fragrance. However, it did not live up to the hype in my books. I was left unimpressed by the dry down and don’t see this up there with competitors such as Rive Gauche, Beau de Jour, etc. I would test this before buying. I think it’s a safe scent, but not a safe blind buy. You won’t offend anyone with this fragrance...but that’s also because no one will be able to smell it on you. I also can’t see this garnering many, if any, compliments.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1302534"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1302534#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1299812" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1299812" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Honestjbone"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1189987"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1189987.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Honestjbone" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Frederic-Malle/Monsieur-32590.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.32590.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Monsieur"title="Monsieur"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1299812ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1299812" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1189987">Honestjbone</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-02-27">02/27/21 15:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Every time I pick this up and smell it, it immediately transports me back to when I got into this hobby/love of mine cause it was one of my first purchases.  <br />
<br />
Can be worn all year round, is not overly loud nor offensive, but sets a statement.  One of my favorites 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1299812"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1299812#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1293766" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1293766" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="danny94"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1202917"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1202917.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="danny94" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/L-Instant-de-Guerlain-pour-Homme-EDP-44763.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.44763.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Instant de Guerlain pour Homme EDP"title="L'Instant de Guerlain pour Homme EDP"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1293766ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1293766" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1202917">danny94</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-02-16">02/16/21 14:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is quite incredible. I was supposed to buy a sample of another Penhaligon's, but clicked the wrong one -- and I'm so glad I did. I don't know how Duchaufour did it, but it massively gives off a feeling or smell of freshly ironed or pressed clothing. I don't mean the smell of detergent but linen and hot steam. As soon as I smelled it it reminded me of my grandparent's house, going up to the spare room where there'd always be neatly folded, recently ironed shirts of my grandad. It's amazingly sharp, neat and smart, without being old-fashioned.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1293766"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1293766#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1262145" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1262145" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sarahherbs"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1179441"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1179441.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sarahherbs" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/1932-Eau-de-Parfum-41778.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41778.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="1932 Eau de Parfum"title="1932 Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1262145ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1262145" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1179441">sarahherbs</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-12-17">12/17/20 07:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Imagine smelling the lapel of someone wearing a bespoke suit adorned with a pocket square and a carnation, a top hat, and a cane. Jidenna circa 2015 wore a ton of bespoke suits and carried ornate canes--Sartorial encapsulates that look. <br />
<br />
This starts off with a very traditional and intense fougere but as it warms up it starts to do some interesting things. This becomes rich, thick, and creamy, while also being slightly dusty. This smells very lived in while also being clean and sharp. Katie Puckrick reviewed this and provided Penhaligon's backstory of Sartorial--a bespoke suit shop that smelled of leather, old machinery, pattern-making paper, cigars, and most importantly warm human bodies hard at work in a confined space. After the initial burst of citrus, lavender, and herbaceous notes peter out, you are left with a warm and complex fragrance that smells like the skin of a person working in this shop for ten hours. As a female, I really enjoyed the dry down and can't wait to wear it again. This is hard to describe so I would recommend getting a sample or trying it on. This leans more masculine in the opening, but the dry down is truly unisex. What an inspired and creative scent!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1262145"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1262145#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1261954" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1261954" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FMilan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1208109"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1208109.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FMilan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Figment-Man-45292.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45292.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Figment Man"title="Figment Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1261954ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1261954" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1208109">FMilan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-12-16">12/16/20 18:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sartorial is kind of an intersection point between Invasion Barbare and Beau de Jour. The father of these two siblings. And better than both.<br />
<br />
In my humble opinion, the pinnacle of the fougères. If you want a good fougère, lavender done right, it doesn't get better than this.<br />
<br />
Great quality and gets the job done.<br />
<br />
10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1261954"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1261954#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1258320" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1258320" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fishcan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1000937"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1000937.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fishcan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Burberry-London-Special-Edition-for-Men-4693.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4693.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Burberry London Special Edition for Men"title="Burberry London Special Edition for Men"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1258320ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1258320" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1000937">Fishcan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-12-08">12/08/20 10:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I purchased this last month as a blind buy when Penhaligons had an 'open' box sale and combined with a code it was £22. At that price it was rude not to. Now I wished that I'd bought a couple of bottles as the more I wear it the more I love it. I wear this when I'm wearing something smarter than usual and normally reach for the Grey Vetivier or similar, it's such a beautiful fragrance and makes me feel dapper.<br />
I get most of the notes but can really smell the beeswax, which I thought might be a bit odd, but combined with the other notes it just works.<br />
I'll definitely buy this again and will be keeping an eye open for more open box sales.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1258320"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1258320#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1258309" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1258309" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jero"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/72622"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.72622.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jero" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Addict-Eau-de-Toilette-25159.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25159.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Addict Eau de Toilette "title="Dior Addict Eau de Toilette "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1258309ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1258309" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/72622">jero</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-12-08">12/08/20 09:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's a pleasure to see Invasion Barbare in This perfume reminds me of... good work isn't alone. And it's not hard to image like an English gentleman VS a barbarian from different dimension. Sartorial is civilized in the soapy clean lavender while Invasion Barbare's is primitive and outspoken in the uncultured wildness.<br />
<br />
From opening to drydown there're some different stages for S. The lavender shining opening dries down to a soft skin scent, a little gourmand, sillage moderate longevity the same. You may compare Sartorial EDT to Penhaligon's new Brilliantly British EDP, S's lavender is more refined while BB's is a nature beauty as well as more delicious, caramel? toffee?? milk candy... in the same time.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1258309"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1258309#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1241196" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1241196" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Borzoi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1229902"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1229902.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Borzoi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1241196ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1241196" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1229902">Borzoi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-10-25">10/25/20 13:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A traditional aromatic fougère for modern times!<br />
<br />
Inspired by the Savile Row bespoke tailor Norton &amp; Son’s workshop, this fragrance combines classic fougère notes (lavender, oakmoss, and tonka bean) with daring more modern notes (ozonic notes and aldehydes meant to envoke the smell of steam, metallic notes meant to remind you of the scissors in the tailor's workshop) all smoothened out by beeswax, leather, and honey.<br />
The metallic notes combined with the other notes reminds me of how a warm sewing machine smells (a smell you surely know if you've been sewing before!).<br />
<br />
It's a great all-rounder and can be used for almost any occasion, season, and setting. I usually can't stand aldehydes, metallic notes and ozonic notes but in this one they're all so soft and smooth that I don't mind it at all.<br />
<br />
This is definitely one of my favorite fougères, and definitely the best one in the last 10 years. I understand how people think this smells like Brut (1964), but in my mind it's just because they're both in the aromatic fougère genre, not much more than that. This one is definitely leagues ahead of modern Brut at least.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1241196"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1241196#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1231443" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1231443" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dazinho86"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1257271"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dazinho86" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1231443ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1231443" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1257271">Dazinho86</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-10-01">10/01/20 13:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I blind bought this for £22 for 100ml.<br />
<br />
First impressions were that it smells very similar to kouros. Throughout the day I kept smelling my wrist as I was unsure if I liked it or not. It's still there 7 hours later and I've decided I like it. A few years ago when I was in my 20s I wouldn't have entertained this but as I'm older and wiser, I appreciate it for what it is, a manly scent that should be worn with confidence. People will be able to smell you even with a mask on.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1231443"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1231443#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1230518" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Metallic but sweet, modern yet classic, an excellent scent for me as a 20year old male. There's more fitting fragrances for older men but ill be getting through this quickly. 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1222301"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1222301#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1220799" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
