padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1193766">Ardamiactadh</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-09-05">09/05/20 16:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Old money never walked into Savile Row wearing a Tonka Bean base. Sniff....</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1220799"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1220799#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1206892" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1206892" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RedRover"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1249229"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1249229.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RedRover" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lorenzo-Villoresi/Patchouli-5091.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5091.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Patchouli"title="Patchouli"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1206892ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1206892" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1249229">RedRover</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-08-02">08/02/20 23:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really enjoy Sartorial. It's a sophisticated, modern fougere. It's slightly conservative, which makes it great for those times you want to smell great, but not offend. The note combination is pleasing and just interesting enough to keep your attention. In the opening, I get pepper,aldehydes, neroli and metal. I really like how prominent the beeswax is in the heart, layered atop mainly leather and lavender, with the metal still lingering. Finally, the dry down is mostly woody notes and oakmoss. I'm often impressed with how much it projects. On average, I get about 5 hours, with the last 3 hours fairly mild projection. Overall, a very classy fragrance from a great house.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1206892"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1206892#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1197609" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1197609" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="The Gent"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1156206"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1156206.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="The Gent" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1197609ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1197609" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1156206">The Gent</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-07-09">07/09/20 04:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wow, Just wow! If you are looking for a gentlemen's classic look no further. This is a cologne that I would imagine Don Draper wearing if it was around back then. <br />
<br />
Scent: 10/10 Compliment god alert, My wife loves it and I nearly always get complimented when I wear this masterpiece. The scent reminds me of a luxury classic aftershave that is in no means dated. <br />
<br />
Longevity: This will last around 10 hours for me and is by no means offensive.<br />
<br />
Overall: 10/10 a gentlemen's classic. <br />
<br />
If you are looking to smell sophisticated this is the cologne for you. I would buy this again when I am finished with the bottle. As a fan of gentlemen like colognes I consider Sartorial a Grade A Masterpiece. <br />
<br />
Well done Penhaligons well done.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1197609"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1197609#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1180040" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1180040" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fogwalker"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/821659"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.821659.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fogwalker" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mauboussin/Mauboussin-Pour-Lui-in-Black-30138.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30138.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mauboussin Pour Lui in Black"title="Mauboussin Pour Lui in Black"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1180040ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1180040" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/821659">Fogwalker</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-05-25">05/25/20 09:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm happy to say that I've had Sartorial in my collection, on and off, for 10+ years. I like its freshness, it's very clean-cut and to me, is suitable for both afternoon and evening wear.<br />
It doesn't last very long on my skin, unfortunately, but to be honest, neither do a lot of Penhaligon's fragrances.<br />
I think I must be one of the few people here who doesn't think it smells like Brut at all but hey, that's just my opinion :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1180040"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1180040#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1180030" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1180030" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dodi-fischer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1177372"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1177372.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dodi-fischer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1180030ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1180030" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1177372">dodi-fischer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-05-25">05/25/20 08:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance screams for a freshly washed and ironed WHITE SHIRT. Wear it with jeans or trousers, spring or fall daytime and you will do this fragrance justice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1180030"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1180030#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1173147" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1173147" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FlirtBoy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/87229"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.87229.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FlirtBoy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-For-Men-258.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.258.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eternity For Men"title="Eternity For Men"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1173147ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1173147" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/87229">FlirtBoy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-05-08">05/08/20 12:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is quite an interesting fragrance...anyway I still like original Brut (or Rive Gauche) more as they feel more mature and natural. To me, Sartorial just somehow evokes that kind of young "wannabe-gentlemen" in slim suits, huge bowties and slick hair who tend to spend a lot of time in barbershops to ensure themselves in their own "fragile masculinity" and are utterly obsessed with their visage - and that doesn´t work for me. But that is my personal feeling and to be objective I think it deserves some solid 7.5/10 for what it is - a modern and slightly sweet version of traditional aldehydic fougere scents. Fortunately I don´t get much metallic notes. Longevity and projection are good on my skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1173147"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1173147#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1137001" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1137001" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ScentManJojo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1060089"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1060089.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ScentManJojo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Issey-Miyake/L-Eau-d-Issey-Pour-Homme-Noir-Ambre-42055.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42055.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Eau d'Issey Pour Homme Noir Ambre"title="L'Eau d'Issey Pour Homme Noir Ambre"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1137001ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1137001" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1060089">ScentManJojo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-01-22">01/22/20 12:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is straight forward gentlemans scent in the English tradition.  It smells well made and is easy to wear. I get neroli, honey, beeswax, cardamom, lavender, leather and some oakmoss.  I would say it lasts about 7 to 8 hours on myself with 2 hours of solid projection. It would be great on weekends or to the office for sure.  For the price (online $65 to $70) and quality it's great. Enjoy!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1137001"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1137001#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1135051" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1135051" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="atarilynx"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/304605"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.304605.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="atarilynx" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Abdes-Salaam-Attars-Perfumes/Tabac-19389.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.19389.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tabac"title="Tabac"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1135051ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1135051" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/304605">atarilynx</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-01-16">01/16/20 11:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Basically a barbershop scent. Nothing really special. Lavender, some sweetness, some green moss and a very slight metallic tang. It is decent, but it is not remarkable whatsoever. <br />
<br />
It seems to embody a huge amount of varied barbershop scents without being distinctive whatsoever. I get the impression I've smelled it many times before, yet I can't pin where. It smells like something ephemeral, but it's only ephemeral because it doesn't have anything unique to make me remember.<br />
<br />
Quite underwhelmed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1135051"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1135051#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1121455" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1121455" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Zachymcsmacky"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1216539"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1216539.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Zachymcsmacky" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1121455ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1121455" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1216539">Zachymcsmacky</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-12-04">12/04/19 03:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Supreme barbershop scent. It's like Brut mixed with Creed Royal Oud. Except it takes just the best parts of Brut, and refines them. So as you'd expect from that concoction, it's maybe of a more classic style. However, I'm 22 and I wear it well. In fact a girl I was out with at the time convinced me to buy it. It's designed to invoke the raw materials used in tailoring, and I feel it does that well. On me, I get a clean fabric vibe, a light leather and maybe even a mild rubbery accord (not a bad rubber, it's light and pleasant), and somehow they mix that with a classic woody fougere barber smell. It's inoffensive and pretty much appropriate for whenever, and would wear very well on a suit. It's the scent of a 24/7 gent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1121455"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1121455#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1118893" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1118893" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="talkaboutscents"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1079076"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1079076.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="talkaboutscents" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1118893ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1118893" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1079076">talkaboutscents</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-11-25">11/25/19 12:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I think this is great. It smells like a blend of coumarin-cedar-lavender-bergamot, with some complex touches which are subtle so at first sniff Brut comes to mind but i think if you do a side-by-side Sartorial will stand out with the subtle differences making this a high quality juice. This is perfect for daily use and performance is great on me at 25 degrees celcius.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1118893"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1118893#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1117218" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1117218" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="GustaveTheNose"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1015635"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1015635.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="GustaveTheNose" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Gold-Man-918.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.918.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gold Man"title="Gold Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1117218ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1117218" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1015635">GustaveTheNose</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-11-19">11/19/19 16:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The note pyramid is incorrect, as Penhaligon's website mentions the following missing notes: tobacco, hay, and bitter almonds. Other notes found in this pyramid and the original website are violet leaf, lavender, leather, amber, woods, beeswax, honey, and oakmoss. Any other notes different to the above are not on the Penhaligon's website.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1117218"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1117218#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1114347" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1114347" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CheekyChap"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1167951"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1167951.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CheekyChap" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lorenzo-Pazzaglia/Black-Sea-69652.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69652.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Sea "title="Black Sea "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1114347ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1114347" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1167951">CheekyChap</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-11-10">11/10/19 05:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Modern Classic is a bit of a cliché, but suits this fragrance quite well. I can understand the niche version of Brut comments even if I do find it a little derogatory to this fragrance.<br />
<br />
Penhaligon is a house I wish I could love more.  Frankly I find so few of their fragrances stand out for me and often lack in decent longevity.<br />
<br />
 The beeswax and metallic notes make this a little devisive but  necessary to visualise the tailor shop vibe the perfumer is creating. This makes a good gents day to day fragrance for spring/fall weather. smart casual and available at discounters at a good price. Longevity for me is 6 to 8 hours in mild weather. Silage and projection moderate. Very solid for an EDT.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1114347"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1114347#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1112767" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1112767" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dcjimr"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1186069"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1186069.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dcjimr" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1112767ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1112767" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1186069">dcjimr</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-11-05">11/05/19 07:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I agree with the previous comment that this comes across as completely generic and it reminds me of some after shave my dad wore in the 70s.  That’s not necessarily a bad thing, but at Penhaligon’s price I think you can do better.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1112767"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1112767#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1112387" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1112387" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="xvxmatthewxvx"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1028003"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1028003.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="xvxmatthewxvx" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Serge-Lutens/Five-O-Clock-Au-Gingembre-2764.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2764.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Five O'Clock Au Gingembre"title="Five O'Clock Au Gingembre"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1112387ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1112387" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1028003">xvxmatthewxvx</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-11-04">11/04/19 00:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>starts out herbal &amp; astringent with lavender <br />
<br />
leathery, soapy, powdery <br />
<br />
later in the dry down the beeswax, honey, amber, &amp; tonka are noticeable &amp; as amazing as that sounds, it comes across generic, the quality just isn't there, it's not mouth-watering or wrist crack in any way ... <br />
<br />
i know a lot of folks love this one so to each their own, this is why perfume is so personal &amp; subjective to each persons taste</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1112387"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1112387#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1095666" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1095666" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DrNDJas"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1063104"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1063104.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DrNDJas" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Caron/L-Anarchiste-6380.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6380.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Anarchiste"title="L'Anarchiste"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1095666ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck9x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1095666" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1063104">DrNDJas</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-09-08">09/08/19 10:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I’m a professor at a university and this, guys, is a perfect perfume for academia. I finally found the perfect scent to go with my corduroy blazer with leather elbow patches and brown oxfords- Sartorial!  While none of these things are particularly sexually alluring, they do portray a stolid sense of benign intellectual authority and manly erudition, coupled with a good-if not somewhat antiquated-sense of personal grooming.  Think of wearing this one while reading in some prodigious great library, surrounded by stacks of leather bound volumes of classic literature.  Smoking a pipe, perhaps. This fragrance just may raise the wearer’s IQ by a few points.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1095666"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1095666#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1090734" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1090734" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gedlive"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/866522"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.866522.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gedlive" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Equipage-7.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.7.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Equipage"title="Equipage"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1090734ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1090734" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/866522">gedlive</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-08-23">08/23/19 15:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wow, I just took my Sartorial out of storage for the Fall. Noticing here the prices have gone way up. I got this at least a few years ago when I started collecting. Is it going out of production?<br />
<br />
Having a large mostly niche collection, I think I appreciate this more now.<br />
It is a very interesting fragrance, and a substantial one, of great quality notes.<br />
<br />
I don't think it's as heavy as I once thought. It's medium. It has some nice warm balsamic base notes, but it also has fresh spices, this interesting sour metalic accord, and a bit of citrus.<br />
It is an unusual, lavender fougere after all.<br />
<br />
It does smell like a tweed jacket being steem pressed at a laundry.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1090734"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1090734#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1083100" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1083100" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="frankincense&amp;myrrh"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/995723"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.995723.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="frankincense&amp;myrrh" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Aramis/Aramis-113.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.113.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aramis"title="Aramis"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1083100ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1083100" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/995723">frankincense&amp;myrrh</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-07-30">07/30/19 01:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>SARTORIAL is so right for certain occasions. That said, I find I've only used about half a 50ml bottle (for travel) and a third of a 100ml bottle (in town), over the course of four or five years, since it's come into my collection. Why is that? I can't quite say.<br />
Walking up or down Savile Row, I've often imagined the workshoppes smelling like this! But, alas, this day &amp; age my opportunities to wear a proper suit - let alone a bespoke one - are few &amp; far between. Such is the world in 2019.<br />
The BRUT comparisons are not unfounded but I concur that this leaves BRUT feeling slightly pedestrian and, counterintuitively enough, somewhat more "feminine" in my estimation. There's a sharp aromatic, civilised virility to SARTORIAL whereas BRUT for me, despite numerous older male associations in my memory, has a certain softer, powdery sweetness which comes across quite casual &amp; intimate - even warm &amp; passionate in contrast to the cool, calm, collected incisiveness of SARTORIAL. Duchaufour, who's creations might easily constitute 4 of my top 10 were I to count, offers up something quite formal &amp; cerebral to my nose in this. Perhaps its the certain "starched &amp; pressed linen" aspect I get - nearly veering into woollen - which conjures up nervous, on one's best behaviour, suit-wearing experiences. Encounters with male authority figures of the academic variety comes to mind - or certain Sunday mornings, say, when duty as an usher or lector is the order of business. Touch wood, I've had no funerals to attend since knowing SARTORIAL, but I imagine I might reach for it in such an instance.<br />
Having been raised in an environment where lavender was a default nice scent, it was eye-opening to discover with age that it can in fact be a rather polarising little flower! And on that note I cannot recall ever receiving a compliment whilst wearing SARTORIAL.<br />
Myself, I fancy this neither in the heat nor the cold but prefer it for coolish Spring or early Autumn daytimes. Although I often wear it on occasions when attempting to make an impression of genteel earnestness or professionalism, regardless of season. <br />
Not in my usual rotation by any means, but wonderful in its way, and perfectly suited for when the occasion calls.<br />
Longevity is quite decent and silage renders it certainly present but polite enough.<br />
★★★☆☆</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1083100"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1083100#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1079226" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1079226" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="monkey500"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1144035"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1144035.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="monkey500" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Acqua-di-Parma/Essenza-di-Colonia-9829.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9829.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Essenza di Colonia"title="Essenza di Colonia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1079226ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1079226" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1144035">monkey500</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-07-16">07/16/19 03:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Penhaligon’s Sartorial is quite thick and rich - definitely for colder weather - and is very beeswax and honey and amber forward with great staying power: I got at least 8 or 9 hours longevity. This is a fragrance better suited for older men. A few female friends described it as, ‘very masculine’ but it doesn’t inspire or draw compliments.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1079226"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1079226#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1076002" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1076002" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="teacat68"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/887852"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="teacat68" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Essential-Parfums/Bois-Imperial-64338.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64338.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bois Impérial"title="Bois Impérial"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1076002ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1076002" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/887852">teacat68</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-07-05">07/05/19 04:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lovely clean barbershop fougere. Not too heavy or old fashioned although it does give me a nostalgic vibe which I really enjoy. Classy, English, and great value presently too.<br />
Glad I pulled the trigger on this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1076002"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1076002#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1067223" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1067223" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="powerhouse990"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1196062"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1196062.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="powerhouse990" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Acqua-di-Parma/Acqua-di-Parma-Blu-Mediterraneo-Cipresso-di-Toscana-1686.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1686.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua di Parma Blu Mediterraneo - Cipresso di Toscana"title="Acqua di Parma Blu Mediterraneo - Cipresso di Toscana"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1067223ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1067223" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1196062">powerhouse990</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-06-05">06/05/19 00:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>hugely disappointing if you are like me, one that cant stand Brut!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1067223"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1067223#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1064735" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1064735" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tayyabforyouth"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1124219"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1124219.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tayyabforyouth" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Acqua-di-Parma/Colonia-Club-31424.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31424.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Colonia Club"title="Colonia Club"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1064735ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1064735" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1124219">tayyabforyouth</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-05-27">05/27/19 19:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a beautiful gentlemanly barbershop fougere scent that smells like a niche version of Brut aftershave. The dominant notes in this are a mix of lavender, the scent of metal, green herbal notes that smell of oakmoss, and a splash of honey. The mix of the 4 notes is extremely pleasant. I especially like the herbal green notes in this, and in fact I prefer this to Houbigant's Fougere Royale (another barbershop fougere that I used to own). Performance is also pretty great with this fragrance. Maybe the best of the Penhaligon's lineup, along with Castile.<br />
<br />
5/5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1064735"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1064735#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1063361" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
