                            <div id="parent1095666" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1095666" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DrNDJas"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1063104"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1063104.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DrNDJas" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Caron/L-Anarchiste-6380.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6380.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Anarchiste"title="L'Anarchiste"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1095666ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck9x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1095666" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1063104">DrNDJas</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-09-08">09/08/19 10:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I’m a professor at a university and this, guys, is a perfect perfume for academia. I finally found the perfect scent to go with my corduroy blazer with leather elbow patches and brown oxfords- Sartorial!  While none of these things are particularly sexually alluring, they do portray a stolid sense of benign intellectual authority and manly erudition, coupled with a good-if not somewhat antiquated-sense of personal grooming.  Think of wearing this one while reading in some prodigious great library, surrounded by stacks of leather bound volumes of classic literature.  Smoking a pipe, perhaps. This fragrance just may raise the wearer’s IQ by a few points.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1095666"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1095666#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent131083" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc131083" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="alfarom"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/37900"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.37900.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="alfarom" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Serge-Lutens/Gris-Clair-593.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.593.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gris Clair"title="Gris Clair"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma131083ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd131083" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/37900">alfarom</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2011-03-03">03/03/11 03:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ok, yes, I love Bertrand Duchaufour's creations but besides that I think Sartorial is a great scent. (Deservedly) ambitious and complex as an "architectural structure"! A perfect union between classic and modern. A traditional fougere with a retrò feel always balanced by an hyper modern allure given by the "effects" notes (beeswax, metal, old wood). I'd say this  one is more a sensation than  a real perfume and that's why I love it. <br />
<br />
As I previously said is quite complex but so well executed to become a perfect everyday's fragrance for anyone into modern classicism.Sillage is good, lasting power not much (4-5 hours on my skin) but I still firmly believe this one to be highly recommendable.<br />
<br />
Rating: 8.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="131083"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=131083#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent396450" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc396450" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Aaredhel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/515614"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.515614.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Aaredhel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lush/Rentless-48441.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48441.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rentless"title="Rentless"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma396450ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd396450" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/515614">Aaredhel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2013-08-15">08/15/13 11:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Am I the only woman wearing this fragrance? mm I don't think so...<br />
This is really a smelling experience. This scent develops and evolves on your skin from being a cold metallic sort of smell into something warm and mesmerizing. Very elegant indeed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="396450"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=396450#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1197609" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1197609" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="The Gent"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1156206"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1156206.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="The Gent" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1197609ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1197609" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1156206">The Gent</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-07-09">07/09/20 04:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wow, Just wow! If you are looking for a gentlemen's classic look no further. This is a cologne that I would imagine Don Draper wearing if it was around back then. <br />
<br />
Scent: 10/10 Compliment god alert, My wife loves it and I nearly always get complimented when I wear this masterpiece. The scent reminds me of a luxury classic aftershave that is in no means dated. <br />
<br />
Longevity: This will last around 10 hours for me and is by no means offensive.<br />
<br />
Overall: 10/10 a gentlemen's classic. <br />
<br />
If you are looking to smell sophisticated this is the cologne for you. I would buy this again when I am finished with the bottle. As a fan of gentlemen like colognes I consider Sartorial a Grade A Masterpiece. <br />
<br />
Well done Penhaligons well done.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1197609"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1197609#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent393518" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc393518" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Odysseus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/541994"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.541994.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Odysseus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma393518ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd393518" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/541994">Odysseus</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2013-08-06">08/06/13 16:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like a high-end, quality Brut. My wife says it's the scent of a dirty, oily old man with a comb-over, who watches porn and who drools over young women. What can I say... my new signature scent? I think it's the way a REAL man should smell: fresh and confident. I wouldn't describe it as "elegant sophistication", but more of a "I don't care what you think about my cologne" kind of scent. For 40+ men only.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="393518"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=393518#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="10559" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent187326" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc187326" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scentrist"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/8051"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.8051.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scentrist" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-53641.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53641.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud for Greatness"title="Oud for Greatness"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma187326ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd187326" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/8051">Scentrist</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2011-10-06">10/06/11 09:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There are a couple of issues to address in Sartorial.  First, is the opening is quite harsh, very metallic and ozonic, and a bit difficult to break through as it is completely dominant for the first 30-40 minutes. Second, it's trying much too hard to be something more than it really is.  Finally, despite the ingredient list longer than a box of Twinkies, this manages to still be rather linear in its transformation.<br />
<br />
I don't get aromatic fougere from this at all, but I feel transfixed from the opening on this as a Barbershop-like clean scent, which isn't a bad thing. That remained from the top -- where it was most overpowering -- to its base several hours later , when it became tolerable, sedated, and a bit more refreshing, and certainly more powdery in the dry-down.  Again, it seemed analagous to a barbershop visit from my childhood where you open with that very strong after-shave aroma, calmed later by talcum powder. The scent is simple, clean, fairly unpretentious in the final outcome.<br />
<br />
So why did it take more than 24 different elements to resurrect what otherwise would be a turn-of-century, classic experience? The outcome seems too spare for the elements in the composition, many of which are beyond detection -- for instance, I don't sense wood or leather in this at all, though I'd say it was over-the-top if I noticed those as well. It stays linear with the opening, same continuity throughout.<br />
<br />
I don't dislike it, though compared to my other scents, this isn't one I'd find myself wearing much. It's not quite my personal style or profile, despite it being both jolly well-executed and jolly pricey.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="187326"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=187326#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1045187" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1045187" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="alanwake"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1174422"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1174422.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="alanwake" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mad-et-Len/Paname-40981.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40981.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Paname"title="Paname"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1045187ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1045187" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1174422">alanwake</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-03-27">03/27/19 08:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sartorial is slightly sharp in the opening but soon settles, the scent becomes smooth as butter.  It reminds me of a lot barbershop scents but it’s actually a woody oriental. There’s far too many, spices, and the leather is quite prominent, along with myrrh, and a little smoke. I don’t get much honey on my skin which is a great. Regardless, this is a great one for the colder months.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1045187"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1045187#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1079226" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1079226" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="monkey500"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1144035"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1144035.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="monkey500" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Acqua-di-Parma/Essenza-di-Colonia-9829.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9829.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Essenza di Colonia"title="Essenza di Colonia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1079226ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1079226" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1144035">monkey500</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-07-16">07/16/19 03:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Penhaligon’s Sartorial is quite thick and rich - definitely for colder weather - and is very beeswax and honey and amber forward with great staying power: I got at least 8 or 9 hours longevity. This is a fragrance better suited for older men. A few female friends described it as, ‘very masculine’ but it doesn’t inspire or draw compliments.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="1079226"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=1079226#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent920948" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc920948" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Hastey"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1071080"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1071080.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Hastey" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rasasi/Tobacco-Blaze-21365.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.21365.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tobacco Blaze"title="Tobacco Blaze"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma920948ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd920948" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1071080">Hastey</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-03-12">03/12/18 01:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It’s a lavender heavy fragrance, if you love lavender you’ll love this. The beeswax is not pleasant to my nose though, it doesn’t mix well with the lavender. So much so I wouldn’t wear this in the future or buy a bottle of it. If you like barbershop lavender fragrances give it a shot. It’s a no from me. <br />
<br />
Fragrantica really needs a neutral button, I don’t dislike it, but I don’t like it. It’s ok.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="920948"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=920948#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent241304" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc241304" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vincents1278"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/30992"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.30992.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vincents1278" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Petit-Matin-40817.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40817.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Petit Matin"title="Petit Matin"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma241304ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd241304" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/30992">Vincents1278</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2012-04-12">04/12/12 09:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wanted to love this. I tried it and was struck by how much it smelled like some old drugstore cologne. I gave it another try and started liking it more, especially how it changes over time on the skin. Sometimes I can really smell the "wool, oil, ozone, metal and leather" of the taylor's shop. And then one day I smelled it and realized it smells mostly like deoderant. $80 deoderant. Sorry, Penhaligon's. That's the last one I'm trying from you guys.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="10559"comment_id="241304"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Sartorial-10559.html?ccid=241304#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="10559" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="search-reviews"><search-perfume-reviews :perfume_id="10559":random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]"></search-perfume-reviews></div></div><foundation-tabs></foundation-tabs></reviews-wrapper></div><perfume-shortcut-menu :perfume_id="10559" when-hidden="#toptop"></perfume-shortcut-menu><initialize-status-data></initialize-status-data><div class="cell small-12"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_footer -->

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x250" id="fragranticacom_perfume_mrec_1" v-pre>
</div>
        
        <div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="latest-list flex-container">
        <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/m.68415.jpg" style="width: 60px; height: 64px; margin-right: 0.5em; flex-shrink: 0"/>
        <a href="/perfume/Dior/Sauvage-Elixir-68415.html#cc2367111"><span class="link-span"></span>
            <span class="brand">Dior</span><br>            <span class="ztworowseclipse">Sauvage Elixir</span>
        </a>
        <span class="avatar-tip" data-tooltip aria-haspopup="true" data-show-on="medium" data-disable-hover="false"
              tabindex="1" title="Sauvage Elixir carries the recognizable Sauvage DNA, enriched with darker and warmer nuances. Its character is solid, strong and confident.">by
            <em>francesco_grieco</em> <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/s.1763409.jpg"

    let userNoteBookLangVar = {
        placeholder:"Your private note up to 255 characters long.",
        title:"for test",
        add_note:"add a personal note",
        edit_notebook:"Edit my note",
        save:"Save",
    }

    let customizePerfumePageLangVar = {
        customize_perfume_page:"Customize perfume page",
        customize_small_chart:"Small chart",
        customize_large_chart:"Large chart",
        customize_colors:"Colors",
        customize_charts_size:"Charts size",
    }

    let pulseLangVariables = {
        pulse:"Fragrantica Pulse",

    let done_flickity = false;

    $(document).ready(function () {

                if (lang == 'EL') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.gr").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'ZH') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.asia").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'NL') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.nl").replace(/designers/, "ontwerper").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'SR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.punmiris.com").replace(/designers/, "dizajner").replace(/perfume/, "parfem") });
                if (lang == 'RO') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ro").replace(/designers/, "creatori").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'AR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragranticarabia.com").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'UK') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ua").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'MN') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.mn").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'HE') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.co.il").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
            });
</script>


<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFFe5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11');
        });
    }
</script>
<script>
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $('#fragranticaloader').fadeOut(20);
    });
</script>
</body>
</html>
